name: Harold's Last Stand by Neuralsplyce
description:
Harold, the default Hero of RPG Maker MV, is retiring with the release of RPG Maker MZ on 20 August 2020. In this game, you play through the first  day in his life as a retired hero.

This  is an entry for the Harold's Last Stand Jam contest. Gameplay is about 10 minutes. The maps are RTP,  but many of the graphical and audio elements are custom.
